purpose: To load large number of records to an object in Salesforce
tool: use this tool:  sfdx mohanc:bulkapi:load  -u <username>  -f input.csv -e LF -o Case

purpose: To update large number of records in an object in Salesforce
tool: use this tool: sfdx mohanc:bulkapi:update  -u <username>  -f input.csv -e LF -o Case

purpose: To delete large number of records in an object in Salesforce
tool: use this tool: sfdx mohanc:bulkapi:delete  -u <username>  -f input.csv -e LF -o Case

purpose: To query large number of records in an object in Salesforce
tool: use this tool: sfdx mohanc:data:bulkapi:query  -u <username>  -q queryFile [input.soql]

purpose: To list the recipes in CRMA
To find the difference between 2 files
To get glossary of Salesforce terms
To get a chatbot which answers Salesforce questions
To record screen with and without voice
To take photo in a photo booth
